fr.loghub.log4j

Class ZMQAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      • fr.loghub.log4j.SerializerAppender
        • fr.loghub.log4j.ZMQAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler

    public class ZMQAppender
extends SerializerAppender
    Sends LoggingEvent objects to a remote a Ã˜MQ socket,.

    Remote logging is non-intrusive as far as the log event is concerned. In other words, the event will be logged with the same time stamp, NDC, location info as if it were logged locally by the client.

    SocketAppenders do not use a layout. They ship a serialized LoggingEvent object to the server side.

    Author:
    Fabrice Bacchella
